string-array.name: floating_in_app_notification
string-array.item: Share a quick update without interrupting the user flow.

string-array.name: small_in_app_notification
string-array.item: An In-App format useful for sharing longer updates.

string-array.name: medium_in_app_notification
string-array.item: A rich In-App format with a cover image and optional message.

string-array.name: full_screen_in_app_notification
string-array.item: Show a full screen image with a call to action to engage users.
